content.raw:
Note that this change requires to update the Debian control file:

[#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport5-release/src/default/ubuntu/debian/control](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport5-release/src/default/ubuntu/debian/control)

@{557058:155a32e2-420c-4d50-98e0-0e722f63f906} , do you see any problems bumping the Ignition CMake version? We typically do not bump the major version of a dependency without bumping the major version of Ignition Transport.
content.html:
Note that this change requires to update the Debian control file:

#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport5-release/src/default/ubuntu/debian/control

@Jose Luis Rivero , do you see any problems bumping the Ignition CMake version? We typically do not bump the major version of a dependency without bumping the major version of Ignition Transport.
